body.p: A tasks is defined by one or more action.
Depends of plugins fusinv[...] installed, for example, you can have a wakeonlan of a computer at 1 hour am and a local inventory at 2 hours am.

ul.li: New action: form used to add a new action.

Action [number]: it's an action defined. Number is incremental, so if there are 4 actions, 4 tabs are displayed : Action 1, Action 2, Action 3 and Action 4. These tabs are sorted by time of execution (Action 1 at 0 seconds after task begin , Action 2 at 30 minutes after the first action etc...).
